programme.title: Bréidín & Clúmh
programme.desc: Tá braon anuas sa díon! Cuireann Clúmh an-suim san uisce. (Drops of water are falling from the ceiling! Fluff is fascinated by water.)

programme.title: CoComelon It's Cody Time
programme.desc: Beidh Cody ag dul chuig an obair lena Dhaide inniu! (Join Cody as he goes to work with Dad!)

programme.title: CoComelon JJ's Animal
programme.desc: Tá Wally, JJ agus Boba ag iarraidh dul ag seoltóireacht. (Wally the wolf tries to show his crew mates, JJ and Boba, the way to sail a pirate ship.)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Is é Breithlá Bingo inniu é ach cá bhfuil sé? (It's Bingo's birthday but where has he gone? Can you help JJ find Bingo the dog?)

programme.title: Digley & Dazey

programme.title: Digley & Dazey
programme.desc: Tá sé ag sneachta! Meas tú céard a dhéanfaidh na cairde as sneachta? (It's a fun snowy day at Construction HQ. I wonder what they're building today - an ice rink!)

programme.title: Digley & Dazey
programme.desc: Lá geimhridh atá ann agus tá an criú ar bís tús a chur leis an obair. Ag déanamh muileann gaoithe a bheidh siad! (Today the crew are building a windmill!)

programme.title: Abby's Amazing Adventure

programme.title: Igam Ogam

programme.title: Seó Luna

programme.title: Momonsters

programme.title: Banainmhithe
